    1. defaultValue(Class)

Class Defaults

java.lang.Object
com.google.common.base.Defaults
@GwtIncompatible public final class Defaults extends Object
This class provides default values for all Java types, as defined by the JLS.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Ben Yu

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static <T> @Nullable T
    defaultValue(Class<T> type)
    Returns the default value of type as defined by JLS --- 0 for numbers, false for boolean and '\0' for char.

    Methods inherited from class Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • defaultValue

      public static <T> @Nullable T defaultValue(Class<T> type)
      Returns the default value of type as defined by JLS --- 0 for numbers, false for boolean and '\0' for char. For non-primitive types and void, null is returned.
